RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 10800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE ON THE TURF. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 30 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. (If necessary will be run ONE MILE Main Track.) .
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PANGEA in close at the break dropped well back early picking it up along the outside on the far turn losing ground to upper stretch surging late seven wide getting a nose down on the wire. SHANNON'S GIRL saved ground rallying along the rail on the turn bidding clear in upper stretch being grabbed by a wide running foe at the wire. FORTUNA ADIUVAT stalked the pace pressing in bid on the far turn extending near mid track down the lane threatening to the end. SEMIRAMIS raced evenly through the backside mounting a bid on the far turn coming up short from mid track down the lane. MARIPOSA D'ORO sent clear set the early pace being hooked outside the quarter pole fading to pressure in upper stretch. LADY MECHANIC stalked the early pace wavering on the far turn giving way into upper stretch. SWIFT RITHMS folded up after a half mile.

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Mechanic
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, gave way to lane

ENTRY.NAME: Semiramis
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, pressed far turn, weakened, mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Mariposa d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, hooked far turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Pangea
ENTRY.COMMENT: in close break, lagged to far turn, swung out, rallied 7 wide

ENTRY.NAME: Shannon's Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, rallied up the rail far turn, cleared, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Fortuna Adiuvat
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, pressed far turn, extended lane, stayed on

ENTRY.NAME: Swift Rithms
ENTRY.COMMENT: folded up after a half mile

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile O r Over Since June 30 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility). (If necessary will be run SAME DISTANCE Main Track.).

CLAIM.OWNER: Pesaturo Gus and Joy Kevin J

RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS FORT slow early advanced to upper stretch angling out to the four path mid stretch surging up in the final strides. MIND YOUR OWN set the pace being engaged from the half dueling from the rail down the stretch battling gamely to the wire. LOST BIKINI stalked the pace advancing in bid on the backstretch dueling abreast rival through the turn then down the lane being outfinished between horses in the last yards. GO STELLAIRE dropped off on the backside finishing evenly while six wide down the lane. ELIANAGRACE faded on the backside. DAIGLE folded up after a half mile.

ENTRY.NAME: Go Stellaire
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped off backside, wide lane,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Fort
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, advanced to lane, angled out, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Lost Bikini
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, middle move, dueled abreast through the lane

ENTRY.NAME: Elianagrace
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on backside

ENTRY.NAME: Mind Your Own
ENTRY.COMMENT: set the pace,o engaged backside, dueled on rail, battled to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Daigle
ENTRY.COMMENT: folded up after a half mile

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 69. Allowance Purse 21200. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 30 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Conside red In Estimating Allowances) (Preference To Highest Earnings in 2022-2023).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CASTLE TOY set the pace coming under outside pressure on the turn angling out into upper stretch tightening rivals while shaking clear on the inside there holding safe to wire. XTRAORDINARYMOTION rallied on the outside to press near the quarter pole being carried out into upper stretch would rally past mid track coming on a willing second best. HOLLY ROLLER pressed in bid between horses on the turn being carried out into upper stretch coming up a bit short near mid track. S S CITY SCOUT never involved. SHEZAGOLDGETTER raced evenly through the turn vying along the inside in upper stretch flattening out late. DIXIE'S DANCE was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Dixie's Dance
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Castle Toy
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, hooked turn, angled out lane, dug in driving,

ENTRY.NAME: S S City Scout
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Shezagoldgetter
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, vied inside upper stretch, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Xtraordinarymotion
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied outside on turn, carried out to lane, vied willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Holly Roller
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed between turn, carried out into lane, bit short mid track

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 62. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WANDA SUSIE DOOZY ducked in sharply at the break rushing to regroup edging clear at the quarter pole widening along the inside in upepr stretch holding under a drive. DASHING LASS raced evenly through the turn moving five wide down the lane responding to finish well. LITTLE FOUR pressed the pace through the turn ceding in upper stretch tiring late. LADY EMPIRE was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Wanda Susie Doozy
ENTRY.COMMENT: ducked in break, rushed to front, clear 1/4 pole, driving inside

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Empire
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Little Four
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, ceded lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Dashing Lass
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, rallied mid track lane, finished well

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JULY 30, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 30 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MONEY FOR MISCHIEF moved to bid on the far turn looming near mid track in upper stretch dueling up late between horses. LEMON BLITZ slow early gained outside on the far turn losing ground to upper stretch surging late in the six path. PAISANO stalked the pace wresting the lead on the far turn digging in along inside down the lane ceding late to outside pressure. BACK ALLEY CAT slow early lagged to upper stretch mustering a mild rally there after the fact. ONLYATTHESHOE sent clear set the pace ceding on the far turn tiring the final eighth. TOMMY TUESDAY refused as the gate opened breaking very late. TRIBULATION gave way on the backside.

ENTRY.NAME: Money for Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied far turn, loomed top lane, rallied up between foes

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: J. D. Stuart, Peter Bance, A. R.Enterprises, Inc. & Orrin

ENTRY.NAME: Back Alley Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, mild rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Paisano
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid clear far turn, extended inside lane, outbid

ENTRY.NAME: Tommy Tuesday
ENTRY.OWNER: Gray Christopher L and Gray Melissa R
ENTRY.COMMENT: refused off very late

ENTRY.NAME: Tribulation
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way on backside

ENTRY.NAME: Onlyattheshoe
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, ceded far turn, tired lane

ENTRY.NAME: Lemon Blitz
ENTRY.OWNER: MCM Racing LLC and Jansen Kenny
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, gained far turn, lost ground to lane, surged late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 8700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JANUARY 30, 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 30 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KICKSTARTER broke sharply to an early lead being challenged on the turn responding to widen in upper stretch holding firm to wire. DONNELS CREEK rushed up to threaten on the turn being rebuffed into upper stretch needing all late in the four path to save place. ARAZI LIKE MOVE slow early raced inside to upper stretch finding best stride late near the rail. PRETTY STORMY was never involved. MAGICAL EXPRESS hustled along would tire into upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Magical Express
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, used up lane

ENTRY.NAME: Arazi Like Move
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, raced inside to upper stretch, best stride late,

ENTRY.NAME: Donnels Creek
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up on turn, rebuffed lane, needed all to save place

ENTRY.NAME: Pretty Stormy
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Kickstarter
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace, dug in three path, held firm

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 21200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 30 Allowed 3 l bs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).

CLAIM.OWNER: Pesaturo Gus and Joy Kevin J

RACE.FOOTNOTES: KOZY'S WILDCAT set the pace being hooked from the quarter pole ceding the lead in upper stretch battling back from mid track to prevail gamely. SHELTOWEE'S BALI chased the pace saving ground to upper stretch bidding gamely to wire from the rail. RAYMOND stalked the pace losing ground to upper stretch vying gamely late six wide. DRIVE BY LAYOVER slow early swung out on the turn racing seven wide down the lane reaching late contention. BAAGY rushed up along the inside on the turn taking a short lead in upper stretch dueling mid stretch ceding late between horses. DARK OAK hustled along chased to upper stretch weakening on the inside there. TRAGICALLY QUEWICK played no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Kozy's Wildcat
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Ronney W and Eastham Richard
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, hooked from turn, ceded leadm dug in mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Sheltowee's Bali
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, saved ground to lane, bid gamely along the rail

ENTRY.NAME: Baagy
ENTRY.OWNER: Pesaturo Gus and Joy Kevin J
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up inside turn, led upper stretch, ceded between foes

ENTRY.NAME: Tragically Quewick
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Dark Oak
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, chased to lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Raymond
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, lost ground to lane, vied gamely late 6 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Drive by Layover
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, swung out turn, 7 wide lane, closed late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 30 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BON DEUX stalked earlt gaining on the turn looming at mid track in upper stretch dueling inside of foe late getting up gamely. GREGORIA'S BAY went evenly through the turn losing ground to upper stretch surging gamely late six wide to be right there abreast rival at the wire. REGAL HOLIDAY broke sharply setting a clear pace through the turn digging in from the four path down the lane weakening under outside pressure late. CAJUN BAYOU slow early raced seven wide through the lane. OLD FORTY FIVE off slowly was always outrun. SHAENA BUE was never involved.

ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, outrun,

ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, 7 wide lane

ENTRY.OWNER: Gray Christopher L and Gray Melissa R
